name: Manus Dei (itch)
description:
You are an Exorcist tasked with investigating a town that has become a den for the worst demons. Fight demons with various weapons, restore the town’s defences and protect civilians from the horde of demons determined to destroy what’s left of this small town.

Key Mapping

KeyActionRight Mouse Button (RMB)MoveLeft Mouse Button (LMB)Attack1, 2, 3Switch Weapon LoadoutsEInteractEscapePause Game
